pageContext.claim: “I wasn't happy with [Jim] Mattis. I told Mattis to give me a [resignation] letter. He didn't just give me that letter. I told him. ... I didn't like the job he was doing.”
pageContext.analysis: Former Defense Secretary Jim Mattis resigned, bluntly telling Trump in a letter that he disagreed on several foreign policy issues and that he should have a defense secretary better aligned with his views. Mattis's resignation came after Trump abruptly announced a decision to withdraw U.S. troops from Syria, a plan he has since walked back after Mattis's departure.
